mixed.invalidSex: Selected sex is invalid. Sex must correspond with sex in your ID
mixed.invalid-combined-share: Combined share of all fields must be 100%
mixed.funds-in-package-required: At least one fund is required in the portfolio.
mixed.forbidden-investment-type: Fund does not allow portfolio's investment type

string.length: This field must be exactly {length} {length, plural, one {character} other {characters}}
string.min: This field must be at least {min} {min, plural, one {character} other {characters}}
string.max: This field must be at most {max} {max, plural, one {character} other {characters}}
string.email: This field must be a valid e-mail

number.min: This field must be greater than or equal to {min}
number.max: This field must be less than or equal to {max}
number.lessThan: This field must be less than {less}
number.moreThan: This field must be more than {more}
number.integer: This field must be an integer

date.max: This field must be at earlier than [max, date]
date.min: This field must be later than [min, date]
